channel.title: [PI] Cooking skill - Adding Hp/Prayer/Run bar!
channel.description:
First Question:
Well, when i try to cook food in my server all the food in my bag get cooked Which i don't need that, How i can change this That i need to cook each food alone?
Second Question:
Anyone can tell me how i can add Hp/Prayer/Running bar that next to my map? Or any tutorial how to add this bar?
Thanks.
